kube_list_error: An error has occurred loading your clusters.
kube_common_node_pool_title_multiple: Configure one or more node pools (optional)
kubernetes_add_private_network: Choose a private network for this cluster
kubernetes_add_private_network_descripti: IP addresses from the selected private network’s VLAN will be assigned to your nodes.
kube_list_node_pools: Need persistent volumes for multiple pods across different nodes and availability zones? Try our fully managed File Storage service, compatible with Managed Kubernetes Service. Get ‘Read Write Many’ volumes that seamlessly scale with your clusters, starting from 150 GiB.
kube_list_node_pools_floating_ip_warning: Enabling Floating IPs comes with an extra charge. Each current and future instance of this node pool will be assigned a Floating IP, at {{price}}.
Disabling will detach the Floating IPs immediately. These addresses will be permanently released and cannot be retrieved.
